title: Trump signs House funding bill ending shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed the legislation passed by the House, ending the longest shutdown in U.S. history.

title: Which 6 House Democrats voted with Republicans to end the shutdown?
shortDescription: All six of the House Democrats who joined Republicans to approve a deal to end the government shutdown represent swing congressional districts.

title: 5 key moments from House vote to end the shutdown
shortDescription: Things got tense on the House floor as lawmakers voted to reopen the government.

title: USA TODAY reporter on vote to end shutdown
shortDescription: USA TODAY's Congress reporter Zachary Schermele takes a closer look at the House of Representatives voting to end the government shutdown.

title: After shutdown, do Democrats win the long game on health care?
shortDescription: What will voters remember next November? President Trump claims victory on the shutdown, but the health care crisis is now guaranteed to persist.

title: House to vote next week on bill to release Epstein files, Johnson says
shortDescription: Speaker Mike Johnson said the House will vote next week on a bill compelling the Justice Department to fully release the Jeffrey Epstein files.

title: Epstein email alleges Trump knew
shortDescription: Democrats urged the DOJ to release all Epstein files after a newly released email alleged President Donald Trump 'knew about the girls.'

title: Adelita Grijalva sworn in, securing Epstein files vote
shortDescription: "I will sign the discharge petition right now to release the Epstein files," she said on the House floor.

title: With House back, discharge petition on Epstein files bill gets new air
shortDescription: As the House of Representatives returns, lawmakers trying to force a vote on the Epstein files got their last signature. What next?

title: Trump warns Republicans to stay out of 'trap' over Epstein files
shortDescription: President Trump warned Republicans to say out of House Democrats' push to release Jeffrey Epstein-related files.

title: See timeline of recent events in Donald Trump-Jeffrey Epstein saga
shortDescription: While President Trump was once friends with Jeffrey Epstein, he has denied any knowledge of Epstein's sex trafficking. Here's a timeline of recent events.

title: When is the shutdown vote in the House? How to watch live
shortDescription: If the funding deal passes, Trump said he would sign the package Wednesday evening, ending the shutdown.

title: White House reacts to new Epstein emails
shortDescription: The White House called newly released emails from Jeffrey Epstein that included President Donald Trump's name a "distraction campaign."

title: Iowa Democrats lost 200k voters in 15 years. What's it mean for 2026?
shortDescription: Iowaâ€™s Democratic Party has hemorrhaged more than 200,000 active voters since 2009. What happened? And can they begin reversing the trend?

title: Venezuela signs defense law as US tensions rise
shortDescription: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro signed a defense law and ordered military exercises amid heightened U.S. tensions.

title: Watch live: White House press briefing amid Epstein email release
shortDescription: The White House is scheduled to hold a press briefing after Democrats released emails appearing to show Jeffrey Epstein discuss President Donald Trump.

title: House Dem says more Jeffrey Epstein emails mentioning Trump coming
shortDescription: Rep. Robert Garcia says, "The survivors deserve the truth," and that the House Oversight Committee will release more documents "likely later today."

title: Trump named in Epstein-linked emails
shortDescription: Leaked emails from Jeffrey Epstein alleges President Donald Trump spent time with one of his victim, prompting a strong White House response.

title: Trump, Epstein emails not the first time Trump was mentioned in files
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was mentioned in emails from Jeffrey Epstein, according to a new release from House Democrats. Read the emails, other files.
